name: Screenshots
description: A MinUI pak for browsing your saved screenshots. Automatically organized by game/app.
author: mikecosentino

changelog.v0.2.5: Fixed bug with games with an apostrophe in their title and sped up pak loading by only loading list of screenshots on launch, and then building individual games' screenshots when choosing that game.
changelog.v0.2.4: Displays a status screen while rebuilding cache.
changelog.v0.2.3: Moved screenshot delete to list of screenshots.
changelog.v0.2.2: Sped up rebuilding screenshot list after deleting a screenshot.
changelog.v0.2.0: Pressing X while viewing a screenshot will prompt to delete. (I'm working on speeding up the screenshot list rebuild speed)
changelog.v0.1.2: Initial launch for the Pak Store
